Package org.labProject.Agents

Class Citizen

java.lang.Object
org.labProject.Core.Renderable
org.labProject.Agents.Citizen
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimAgent
Direct Known Subclasses:
Courier, Dealer, Kingpin, Police, Producer, RegularCitizen, TownVisitor
public abstract class Citizen extends Renderable implements SimAgent
Main class from which all agents in the simulation inherit. This class is abstract, as it by itself has no defined behavior in the simulation, and so, an agent of this class would be pointless.
See Also:
SimAgent, Renderable

  • Field Details

    • inventory

      public List<Item> inventory
      Holds the information about a given agents inventory. Currently, only used for storing weed at slot 0

    • currentLocation

      public Building currentLocation
      The location on the map, where an agent currently is. If set to null, the agent will not be rendered and is considered to be outside the map

  • Method Details

    • goLocation

      public void goLocation​(Map map, Building building)
      A function which makes an agent go to a given location which is a Building (not a Street)
      Specified by:
      goLocation in interface SimAgent
      Parameters:
      map - An anchor to the Map object.
      building - the Building an agent should go to.

    • goToStreetLocation

      public void goToStreetLocation​(Map map, Building street)
      Similar to goLocation(Map, Building), but used for sending agents to a specified Street, while goLocation(Map, Building) should be used for any other type of Building
      Parameters:
      map - An anchor to the Map object
      street - the Street an agent should go to.

    • randomMovement

      protected void randomMovement​(Map map)
      Calling this function causes an agent to move in a random direction (only walking the Street type buildings)
      Parameters:
      map - An anchor to the Map object
